import './post.css' import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import {Users} from "../../dummyData" ; const Post = ({post}) => { return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} className='postProfileImg' alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people beat their meat to it
{post.comment} Comments
) } export default Post
